original_title: The Magic Kingdom Where Magic Lives
overview: Souvenir DVD from Walt Disney World. Hop aboard the Walt Disney World Railroad with Mickey Mouse as we take a look at the Magic Kingdom Park.  Disney characters take us by the hand on a tour of all the lands of the Magic Kingdom, from a stroll down Main Street USA to the romance of Cinderella Castle in Fantasyland.  We check in with the Pirates of the Caribbean, the Haunted Mansion the Disney mountain range and all the glory of Walt Disney World’s Magic Kingdom.  The tour starts at Mickey’s House in Toon Town Fair.
title: The Magic Kingdom Where Magic Lives
